fields.name: visual markets
fields.admin_html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
<head>
	<title>Continuous Market Admin</title>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodAdmin.js"></script>
	<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap.min.css"></link>
	<script type=text/javascript src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-visual-markets/admin.js"></script>
	<style type="text/css">
		{{ css }}
	</style>
</head>
<body ng-include="'{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-visual-markets/admin.html'"></body>

fields.html:
{% load verbatim %} Wait {% verbatim %}
Economics Experiment
  • User ID: {{ $root.user_id }}
Please wait for experiment to start...
{% endverbatim %}
fields.name: Wait

fields.html:
{% load verbatim %}
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
<head>
  <title>Start</title>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>

  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/d3/d3.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/d3rw.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/asyncCallManagerService.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/synchronizedStopWatch.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css"></link>
    
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-visual-markets/start.js"></script>
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-visual-markets/start.css"></link>
</head>
<body ng-include="'{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-visual-markets/start.html'"></body>
</html>
fields.name: Start

fields.html:
{% load verbatim %} {% load verbatim %} Finish {% verbatim %}
Economics Experiment
  • User ID: {{$root.user_id}}
PeriodXYEarnings
{% endverbatim %}
fields.name: Finish
